text: Stratton Rollins Heath Jr. (born December 28, 1937) is an American politician. He was a member of the Colorado Senate from 2009 to 2017. Heath was the Democratic nominee for governor in 2002. He lost to incumbent Republican governor Bill Owens. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Baltimore Category:Politicians from Colorado Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Rollie Heath
